name: Tetroids
description:
Tetroids is a singleplayer Arcade Game for the htk Gamejam 2022 in which you need to evade falling Tetrominoes (Tetris Blocks) and shoot them before they stack up too high.

  • Try to collect Coins to unlock 3 awesome Skins and update your ship. 
  • Watch out for passing Tetrominoes!!
  • Can you beat your highscore?

Asteroids meets Tetris

Gameplay
  • Shoot and dodge falling Tetrominoes
  • If the Ship gets hit by falling Tetrominoes you lose 1 of the standard 3 lives
  • Automatically swap to Tetris Mode if the Tetrominoes build up too high
  • If the Tetrominoes build up too high in Tetris Mode you lose 1 life
  • Clear as many lines as you can
  • Collect Coins
  • Upgrade Ship (Health / Weapon / Damage / Fire Rate)
  • Unlock Skins with Coins
Controls

Asteroids Mode

  • Move (Left Arrow / Right Arrow)
  • Speed Drop (Down Arrow)
  • Shoot (Space)

Tetris Mode

  • Move (Left Arrow / Right Arrow)
  • Soft Drop (Down Arrow)
  • Hard Drop (Space)
  • Rotate (Clockwise = X / Counterclockwise = Y)
How to play

  • Download
  • Unzip the Game
  • Play and have fun!
